function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Spread of contagious diseases through the use of ontologies and query interfaces","Use of ontologies to model disease aspects can lead to unintentional release of sensitive information","Integration of ontologies and query interfaces could lead to unintended exposure of disease-related data","Dependency on existing ontologies and integration of terms from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the cido ontology","Lack of a comprehensive ontology that models multiple similar diseases may hinder the effective sharing of knowledge and development of vaccines and drugs for emerging pandemics","Exclusion of studies with high log reductions","Estimated average upper-room irradiation flux for reduction in aerosolized sars-cov-2 virions may lead to incorrect uv-c dosing","Exposure to harmful uv-c light due to improper installation or maintenance of uvgi systems","Difficulty in inactivating sars-cov-1 and mers-cov compared to influenza a","Potential exposure to uvgi if not properly installed or maintained","Unknown chemical groups to inactivate sars-cov-2","Exposure to virus due to handling of materials","Inadequate disinfection leading to virus survival on surfaces","Exposure to chemicals such as nitric acid and pure gopts","Limited preparedness and capacity to learn from past experiences","Inadequate role of architects in the resilience process","Lack of flexibility in building facilities and overcrowding","Inadequate user participation in the design process","Lack of consideration for societal changes and future challenges in the design","Lack of resilience in current residential buildings to current and future pandemics"]}
